column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/c651070663a09e2759239097d4561aec952dd641 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
I'm going to fix this the other way around: _enable_ libz-dev for all boost linux builds. Less script impact, and having zlib support in iostreams may be useful some day.\n
